title: Wrapper (Inasa X Chubby Reader Scenario)
body:
“Slow down, Inasa!” you giggle. Your boyfriend proves to be quite childish when it comes to many things - even dates. You very rarely have a movie and dinner. In fact, your most common date is the kind you are sharing today. That would be going to the local sweets shop, buying as much as you could carry, and going to the arcade. As of now, Inasa is racing you to the shop, his taller stature and years of training providing a good advantage ahead of you.

  You’ll admit it. You are overweight. Although, that means nothing to your passionate partner. He loves every ounce on your body, no matter what percentage of it is fat. At first, you thought he was only trying to be nice. Yet, he proved his worth by fiercely protecting you. This in itself greatly improved your confidence.

  “Sweetie! Look!” Hearing Inasa’s excitable voice makes a smile dawn on your exhausted features. The giddy 6′2″ man is eagerly jabbing his finger in the direction of a sign. The large piece of paper reads,

  ‘Limited Time Only! Sweetheart Candies! Caramel hearts with melted dark chocolate cores. Comes in lactose free!’

  A delicious looking photo of a heart shaped candy decorates the cover. Soft golds melts with the deep, rich browns of the melted chocolate that leaked from the bite mark illustrated in the poster. Spit built up in your mouth as your stomach craves such a treat. Especially with it reading ‘Exact product size’ at the bottom right hand corner. The chocolate has to be the size of Inasa’s hand!

  “That looks almost as delicious as you,” Inasa chuckles, his innocent grin leaving you flustered. Your hand goes to swat at him playfully. Your actions are intercepted, however, by him taking your hand in his and kissing it. Before you can utter any embarrassed comment, he purrs, “I love you, too.” That damned man, stealing your breath away.

  Entering the store brings a certain lull over you. The soft Irish melody humming against the walls of the small shop. Oak shelves neat with boxes of assorted chocolates and taffy candies line every side of the shop. A glass counter seats a register, seemingly a little dated. Maybe late 1980′s? Sitting at the bar stool that creaked with age was an older gentleman. White and gray dusted his balding head and plentiful beard.

  With no other patrons, the man was sleeping soundlessly. The walnut colored vest crossed tightly over his navy blue button up, golden buttons dotting the night sky of fabric. A deep shade of mahogany camouflaged his dress pants into the darkly colored floor tiles. Not wanting to disturb him, you and Inasa search the displays for the advertised Sweetheart Candies.

  Low and behold, there wis a elaborated box full of wrapped Sweetheart Candies. Each wrapper has a cheesy saying, making your boyfriend smile. He picks one up and motions towards the other side of the store. In that section, they hold 5′ gummy snakes and 5 lb. bags of peach rings. After picking about $12.00 worth of candy, you both creep to the counter.

  Rousing the man awake, the old gentleman rings up your order wordlessly. You feel his sunken eyes watching your size. Hoping to ignore him, you look over at Inasa. Unfortunately, he has noticed the looks as well. Dark eyes run up the man’s back, his smile slightly faded. Upon being handed your bag, you and Inasa leave the store.

  “Let’s go watch that movie you’ve been telling me about,” Inasa chimes, trying to hide his distaste for how the man was watching you. Nodding bitterly, you head home.

  “Inasa, what are you doing?”

  The movie was interrupted by Inasa softly kissing along your cheek before wrapping his arms around your tummy innocently. He chuckles and kisses your head before popping a peach ring into his mouth.

  “I’m just hugging you,” he purrs before his tone turns soft and gentle, “Remember, you are beautiful, no matter how much you weigh. I saw how much his look bothered you. Please, sweetheart, don’t let yourself get sad because you aren’t seen as pretty by shallow shop keeps.”

  As always, your boyfriend succeeded to cheer you up.
